mapper.select: SELECT quantity FROM tbl_online_warehouse WHERE shoes_id = #{shoesId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_online_warehouse SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE shoes_id = #{shoesId}
mapper.select: select ow.online_warehouse_id, ow.shoes_id, ow.quantity, s.shoes_name, s.shoes_price, s.size, s.shoes_type_id, s.brand_id, st.shoes_type, b.brand_name FROM tbl_online_warehouse ow JOIN tbl_shoes s ON ow.shoes_id = s.shoes_id JOIN tbl_shoes_type st ON s.shoes_type_id = st.shoes_type_id JOIN tbl_brand b ON s.brand_id = b.brand_id order by online_warehouse_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
